constantValues: A gift transaction can be a one-time payment or a recurring payment (that is, monthly or sustainer giving). In addition, the gift can be a pledge (that is, a promise) of a future payment or a current/received payment.

definitions.description: A gift transaction can be a one-time payment or a recurring payment (that is, monthly or sustainer giving). In addition, the gift can be a pledge (that is, a promise) of a future payment or a current/received payment.
